fluff.name: Rogue
entries: 示意她的同伴等待，一个半身人蹑手蹑脚地穿过地牢大厅。她把耳朵贴在门上，然后掏出一套工具，眨眼间就把锁打开了。然后她消失在阴影中，她的战士朋友上前将门踢开。
一个人类潜伏在小巷的阴影中，而他的同伙则准备好了她在伏击中的角色。当他们的目标--一个臭名昭著的奴隶主--经过小巷时，同伙大叫起来，奴隶主前来调查，刺客的刀在他发出声音之前就割断了他的喉咙。
一个地精压抑着笑声，挥舞着手指，神奇地从警卫的腰带上取下了钥匙环。一会儿，钥匙就到了她的手里，牢房的门被打开了，她和她的同伴们可以自由地逃跑了。
罗格依靠技巧、隐蔽性和他们敌人的弱点在任何情况下都能占上风。他们善于找到解决任何问题的办法，表现出足智多谋和多才多艺，是任何成功的冒险队伍的基石。

entries.name: Skill and Precision
entries: 流氓在掌握各种技能的使用方面所付出的努力与他们在完善战斗能力方面所付出的努力一样多，这使他们具有其他角色所不能比拟的广泛的专业知识。许多流氓专注于隐身和欺骗，而其他流氓则完善了在地下城环境中帮助他们的技能，如攀爬、寻找和解除陷阱以及开锁等。
当涉及到战斗时，流氓优先考虑的是狡猾而不是蛮力。一个流氓宁可进行一次精确的攻击，把它准确地放在对目标伤害最大的地方，也不愿意用一连串的攻击把对手耗死。流氓在躲避危险方面有一种近乎超自然的诀窍，少数人学会了魔法技巧来补充他们的其他能力。

entries.name: A Shady Living
entries: 每个城镇和城市都有它的流氓份额。他们中的大多数人都符合这个阶层最糟糕的刻板印象，以盗窃者、刺客、小偷和骗子为生。通常情况下，这些恶棍被组织成盗贼公会或犯罪家族。很多流氓都是独立行动的，但即使他们有时也会招募学徒来帮助他们进行诈骗和抢劫。少数流氓以锁匠、调查员或灭虫员的身份谋生，这在一个可怕的老鼠和狼人在下水道里出没的世界里，可能是一份危险的工作。
作为冒险家，流氓属于法律的两边。有些人是顽固的罪犯，决定在宝藏中寻找他们的财富，而另一些人则是为了逃避法律而开始了冒险的生活。有些人学习并完善了他们的技能，其明确的目的是潜入古代遗迹和隐藏的地窖中寻找宝藏。

entries.name: Creating a Rogue
entries: 当你创造你的流氓角色时，考虑这个角色与法律的关系。你是否有犯罪的过去或现在？你是在逃避法律还是在逃避愤怒的盗贼公会会长？或者你是为了寻找更大的风险和更大的回报而离开公会的？是贪婪驱使你去冒险，还是其他的欲望或理想？
是什么触发了你离开你以前的生活？一个伟大的骗局或抢劫案出了大问题，是否导致你重新评估你的职业？也许你很幸运，一次成功的抢劫给了你所需的硬币，让你摆脱了贫苦的生活。流浪的欲望最终召唤你离开你的家吗？也许你突然发现自己与家人或导师断绝了联系，你不得不找到新的支持手段。或者你结识了一位新朋友--你的冒险队伍中的另一位成员--他向你展示了谋生和发挥你特殊才能的新可能性。

entries.name: Quick Build
entries: You can make a rogue quickly by following these suggestions. First, Dexterity should be your highest ability score. Make Intelligence your next-highest if you want to excel at Investigation or plan to take up the Arcane Trickster archetype. Choose Charisma instead if you plan to emphasize deception and social interaction. Second, choose the {@background charlatan} background.
人们忘记了，冒险进入尘封的坟墓的全部意义是为了带回藏在那里的奖品。战斗是为傻瓜准备的。死人不能花费他们的财富。
当蛮力无法完成工作时，或者当魔法无法使用或不合适时，流氓就会脱颖而出。凭借与隐身术、潜行术和诡计相关的技能，流氓可以以其他角色无法模仿的方式进入和摆脱麻烦。
一些转向冒险的流氓曾是罪犯，他们认为躲避怪物比保持领先法律一步更可取。还有一些人是职业杀手，在合同期内寻找有利可图的应用他们的才能。有些人只是喜欢克服任何挡在他们面前的挑战的快感。
在冒险中，流氓很可能会将外表上的谨慎态度--很少有流氓喜欢战斗--与对战利品的饥渴相混合。大多数时候，在流氓的脑海中，拿起武器对付一个生物并不是为了杀死这个生物，而是为了成为其财宝的新主人。
下面的章节探讨了成为一个流氓的某些方面，你可以用它来增加你的角色的深度。

entries.name: Guilty Pleasures
entries: 流氓所做的大部分事情都是围绕着获得宝藏和防止其他人做同样的事情。在实现这些目标的过程中，几乎没有任何阻碍，只是许多流氓被一种蒙蔽他们思维的强迫症所诱惑，一种不可抗拒的需求必须得到满足，即使这样做是有风险的。
一个流氓的罪恶感可以是获得一件实物，可以是体验到的东西，也可以是在某些时候的行为方式。例如，一个流氓可能无法放弃任何银制的战利品，即使这些战利品挂在城堡守卫的脖子上。另一个人在城市里一天不拿一两个钱包是不行的，只是为了保持练习。
什么是你的流氓角色在机会出现时无法抗拒的一种诱惑，即使屈服于它可能意味着你和你的同伴有麻烦？

entries.caption: Guilty Pleasures
rows: 大型宝石
漂亮脸蛋上的微笑
为你的手指戴上一个新的戒指
挫败某人的自负的机会
最好的食物和饮料
为您的异国钱币收藏添砖加瓦

entries.name: Adversaries
entries: 自然，那些执法者必然会遇到那些违反法律的人，而且很少有流氓不在至少一张通缉令上出现。除此之外，由于他们的职业性质，流氓经常与犯罪分子接触，无论是出于选择还是出于需要。其中一些人也可能是对手，而且他们很可能比普通的城市巡警成员更难对付。
如果你的角色的背景故事中还没有这样的人物，你可以和你的管理员一起想出一个对手出现在你生活中的理由。也许你已经被某个想利用你达到邪恶目的的人监视了一段时间，现在才被你知道。这样的事件可以成为即将到来的冒险的基础。
你的流氓角色是否有一个对手，而这个对手恰好也是一个罪犯？如果是这样，这种关系是如何影响你的生活的？

entries.caption: Adversaries
rows: 你曾在其船上服务的海盗船长；你所说的继续前进，船长称之为叛变。
一个间谍高手，你无意中向他提供了错误的信息，导致了对错误目标的暗杀。
当地盗贼公会的会长，他希望你加入该组织或离开小镇。
一个使用非法手段获取杰作的艺术收藏家
一个利用你作为信使来安排非法会议的围墙
你曾经下过赌注的一个非法斗兽场的老板

entries.name: Benefactor
entries: 在需要别人的帮助之前，很少有流氓能在生活中走得很远，这意味着此后欠下恩人一大笔债。
如果你的角色的背景故事中还没有这类人物，你可以和你的管理员一起确定为什么一个恩人会出现在你的生活中。也许你从你的恩人为你做的事情中受益，却没有意识到是谁在负责，而这个人现在才被你认识。过去是谁帮助了你，无论你当时是否知道，你欠那个人什么作为补偿？

entries.caption: Benefactors
rows: 一个走私者使你免于被抓，但在此过程中损失了一批宝贵的货物。现在你欠那个人一个同样宝贵的人情。
乞丐王曾多次将你从追捕者手中藏起来，以换取未来的考虑。
一位地方法官曾经让你免于入狱，以换取一个强大的犯罪头目的信息。
你的父母在你年轻的时候用他们的积蓄来保释你，现在已经穷困潦倒。
一条龙在有机会的时候没有吃掉你，作为回报，你答应为它留出选择的宝物。
一个德鲁伊曾经帮助你走出困境；现在你看到的任何随机动物都可能是那个恩人，也许是来要求回报的。

classFeature.name: Expertise
entries: At 1st level, choose two of your skill proficiencies, or one of your skill proficiencies and your proficiency with {@item thieves' tools|phb}. Your proficiency bonus is doubled for any ability check you make that uses either of the chosen proficiencies.
At 6th level, you can choose two more of your proficiencies (in skills or with {@item thieves' tools|phb}) to gain this benefit.

classFeature.name: Sneak Attack
entries: Beginning at 1st level, you know how to strike subtly and exploit a foe's distraction. Once per turn, you can deal an extra {@damage 1d6} damage to one creature you hit with an attack if you have advantage on the attack roll. The attack must use a finesse or a ranged weapon.
You don't need advantage on the attack roll if another enemy of the target is within 5 feet of it, that enemy isn't {@condition incapacitated}, and you don't have disadvantage on the attack roll.
额外的伤害量会随着你在这个等级中获得的等级而增加，如游侠表中的偷袭栏所示。

classFeature.name: Thieves' Cant
entries: 在你的流氓训练中，你学会了盗贼之语，一种方言、行话和密码的秘密组合，使你可以在看似正常的对话中隐藏信息。只有懂得盗贼之语的其他生物才能理解这种信息。传达这样的信息所需的时间比直截了当地说出同样的想法要长四倍。
此外，你还了解一套秘密的标志和符号，用来传达简短的、简单的信息，例如一个地区是否有危险或者是盗贼行会的领地，附近是否有战利品，或者一个地区的人是否容易得手或者会给逃跑的盗贼提供一个安全屋。

classFeature.name: Cunning Action
entries: Starting at 2nd level, your quick thinking and agility allow you to move and act quickly. You can take a bonus action on each of your turns in combat. This action can be used only to take the {@action Dash}, {@action Disengage}, or {@action Hide} action.

classFeature.name: Cunning Action: Aim
entries: {@i 2nd-level rogue feature (enhances Cunning Action)}

You gain an additional way to use your Cunning Action: carefully aiming your next attack. As a bonus action, you give yourself advantage on your next attack roll on the current turn. You can use this bonus action only if you haven't moved during this turn, and after you use the bonus action, your speed is 0 until the end of the current turn.

classFeature.name: Roguish Archetype
entries: 在3级的时候，你从可用的原型列表中选择一个你在行使你的流氓能力时模仿的原型。你的原型选择在3级时授予你特性，然后在9级、13级和17级时再次授予你特性。

classFeature.name: Steady Aim
entries: {@i 3rd-level rogue {@variantrule optional class features|tce|optional feature}}
作为一个奖励动作，你在当前回合的下一次攻击卷中给自己带来优势。你只有在本回合内没有移动的情况下才能使用这个奖励动作，在你使用奖励动作后，你的速度为0，直到本回合结束。

classFeature.name: Ability Score Improvement
entries: 当你达到四级时，你可以将你选择的一项能力得分提高2分，或者将你选择的两项能力得分提高1分。
If your DM allows the use of feats, you may instead take a {@5etools feat|feats.html}.

classFeature.name: Proficiency Versatility
entries: {@i 4th-level feature (enhances Ability Score Improvement)}
当你从你的等级中获得能力值提升功能时，你也可以在1级时用你的等级所提供的技能熟练度来替换你的一个技能熟练度（你所替换的熟练度不需要是来自该等级）。
这种变化代表着你的一项技能萎缩了，因为你专注于另一项技能。

classFeature.name: Uncanny Dodge
entries: 从5级开始，当你能看到的攻击者用攻击击中你时，你可以用你的反应将攻击对你的伤害减半。

classFeature.name: Expertise
entries: At 6th level, you can choose two more of your proficiencies (in skills or with {@item thieves' tools|phb}) to gain the benefit of Expertise.

classFeature.name: Evasion
entries: Beginning at 7th level, you can nimbly dodge out of the way of certain area effects, such as a red dragon's fiery breath or an {@spell ice storm} spell. When you are subjected to an effect that allows you to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, you instead take no damage if you succeed on the saving throw, and only half damage if you fail.

classFeature.name: Ability Score Improvement
entries: 当你达到8级时，你可以将你选择的一项能力得分提高2分，或者将你选择的两项能力得分提高1分。
If your DM allows the use of feats, you may instead take a {@5etools feat|feats.html}.

这种变化代表着你的一项技能萎缩了，因为你专注于另一项技能。

classFeature.name: Roguish Archetype feature
entries: At 9th level, you gain a feature granted by your Roguish Archetype.

这种变化代表着你的一项技能萎缩了，因为你专注于另一项技能。

classFeature.name: Reliable Talent
entries: By 11th level, you have refined your chosen skills until they approach perfection. Whenever you make an ability check that lets you add your proficiency bonus, you can treat a {@dice d20} roll of 9 or lower as a 10.

classFeature.name: Ability Score Improvement
entries: 当你达到12级时，你可以将你选择的一项能力得分提高2分，或者将你选择的两项能力得分提高1分。
If your DM allows the use of feats, you may instead take a {@5etools feat|feats.html}.

这种变化代表着你的一项技能萎缩了，因为你专注于另一项技能。

classFeature.name: Roguish Archetype feature
entries: 在13级时，你获得了一个由你的罗古斯原型赋予的功能。

classFeature.name: Blindsense
entries: Starting at 14th level, if you are able to hear, you are aware of the location of any hidden or {@condition invisible} creature within 10 feet of you.

classFeature.name: Slippery Mind
entries: 到15级时，你已经获得了更大的精神力量。你获得了对智慧救赎的熟练掌握。

classFeature.name: Ability Score Improvement
entries: 当你达到16级时，你可以将你选择的一项能力得分提高2分，或者将你选择的两项能力得分提高1分。

entries: {@i 16th-level feature (enhances Ability Score Improvement)}
当你从你的等级中获得能力值提升功能时，你也可以在1级时用你的等级所提供的技能熟练度来替换你的一个技能熟练度（你所替换的熟练度不需要是来自该等级）。
这种变化代表着你的一项技能萎缩了，因为你专注于另一项技能。

classFeature.name: Roguish Archetype feature
entries: 在17级时，你获得了一个由你的罗格利什原型授予的功能。

classFeature.name: Elusive
entries: Beginning at 18th level, you are so evasive that attackers rarely gain the upper hand against you. No attack roll has advantage against you while you aren't {@condition incapacitated}.

classFeature.name: Ability Score Improvement
entries: 当你达到19级时，你可以将你选择的一项能力得分提高2分，或者将你选择的两项能力得分提高1分。

这种变化代表着你的一项技能萎缩了，因为你专注于另一项技能。

classFeature.name: Stroke of Luck
entries: At 20th level, you have an uncanny knack for succeeding when you need to. If your attack misses a target within range, you can turn the miss into a hit. Alternatively, if you fail an ability check, you can treat the {@dice d20} roll as a 20.
一旦你使用了这个功能，你就不能再使用它，直到你完成一个短期或长期的休息。

subclassFeature.name: Arcane Trickster
entries: 一些流氓用魔法来加强他们精良的隐蔽性和敏捷性的技能，学习魔法和幻术的技巧。这些流氓包括扒手和窃贼，但也包括恶作剧者、恶作剧者和大量的冒险者。

subclassFeature.name: Mage Hand Legerdemain
entries: Starting at 3rd level, when you cast {@spell mage hand}, you can make the spectral hand {@condition invisible}, and you can perform the following additional tasks with it:

items: 你可以将该手所持的一个物体存放在另一生物所穿戴或携带的容器中。
你可以取回另一生物所穿戴或携带的容器中的物品。
You can use {@item thieves' tools|phb} to pick locks and disarm traps at range.

entries: You can perform one of these tasks without being noticed by a creature if you succeed on a Dexterity ({@skill Sleight of Hand}) check contested by the creature's Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) check.
此外，你可以使用你的狡诈行动所赋予的额外行动来控制手。

subclassFeature.name: Spellcasting
entries: When you reach 3rd level, you gain the ability to cast spells. See {@book chapter 10|PHB|10} for the general rules of spellcasting and {@book chapter 11|PHB|11} for the {@filter wizard spell list|spells|class=wizard}.

entries.name: Cantrips
entries: You learn three cantrips: {@spell mage hand} and two other cantrips of your choice from the wizard spell list. You learn another wizard cantrip of your choice at 10th level.

entries.name: Spell Slots
entries: The Arcane Trickster Spellcasting table shows how many spell slots you have to cast your {@filter wizard spells|spells|class=wizard} of 1st level and higher. To cast one of these spells, you must expend a slot of the spell's level or higher. You regain all expended spell slots when you finish a long rest.
For example, if you know the 1st-level spell {@spell charm person} and have a 1st-level and a 2nd-level spell slot available, you can cast {@spell charm person} using either slot.

entries.name: Spells Known of 1st-Level and Higher
entries: 你会三个自选的一级巫师法术，其中两个必须从巫师法术列表中的魔法和幻觉法术中选择。
奥术戏法师法术表的 "已知法术 "一栏显示你何时学会更多1级或以上的巫师法术。这些法术中的每一个都必须是你选择的魔法或幻术，而且必须是你有法术槽的等级。例如，当你达到这个等级的第7级时，你可以学习一个1级或2级的新法术。
你在8级、14级和20级学到的法术可以来自任何魔法流派。
每当你在这个等级中获得一个等级，你可以用你在巫师法术列表中选择的另一个法术替换你所知道的一个巫师法术。新的法术必须是你有法术槽的等级，而且必须是魔法或幻觉法术，除非你替换的是你在3、8、14或20级时从任何魔法流派获得的法术。

entries.name: Spellcasting Ability
entries: Intelligence is your spellcasting ability for your wizard spells, since you learn your spells through dedicated study and memorization. You use your Intelligence whenever a spell refers to your spellcasting ability. In addition, you use your Intelligence modifier when setting the saving throw DC for a wizard spell you cast and when making an attack roll with one.

subclassFeature.name: Magical Ambush
entries: 从9级开始，如果你在对某一生物施法时被隐藏起来，该生物在本回合对该法术的任何蓄力动作中都处于劣势。

subclassFeature.name: Versatile Trickster
entries: At 13th level, you gain the ability to distract targets with your {@spell mage hand}. As a bonus action on your turn, you can designate a creature within 5 feet of the spectral hand created by the spell. Doing so gives you advantage on attack rolls against that creature until the end of the turn.

subclassFeature.name: Spell Thief
entries: 在17级时，你获得了从其他施法者那里神奇地窃取施法知识的能力。
在一个生物施放一个以你为目标或将你包括在其效果范围内的法术后，你可以立即使用你的反应来迫使该生物用其法术能力修正值做一个蓄力动作。蓄力值等于你的法术蓄力值。在救赎失败的情况下，你否定了该咒语对你的影响，并且你窃取了该咒语的知识，如果它至少是1级并且是你可以施展的级别（它不需要是巫师的咒语）。在接下来的8小时内，你知道这个法术，并且可以使用你的法术槽施放它。在8小时过去之前，该生物不能施放该法术。
一旦你使用这个功能，你就不能再使用它，直到你完成长时间的休息。

subclassFeature.name: Assassin
entries: 你的训练重点是严峻的死亡艺术。那些坚持这一原型的人是多种多样的--被雇佣的杀手、间谍、赏金猎人，甚至还有专门受膏的牧师，他们被训练来消灭他们神灵的敌人。隐形、毒药和伪装帮助你以致命的效率消灭你的敌人。
你的原型在3级时授予你特性，然后在9级、13级和17级时再次授予你。

subclassFeature.name: Assassinate
entries: Starting at 3rd level, you are at your deadliest when you get the drop on your enemies. You have advantage on attack rolls against any creature that hasn't taken a turn in the combat yet. In addition, any hit you score against a creature that is {@quickref Surprise|PHB|3|0|surprised} is a critical hit.

subclassFeature.name: Bonus Proficiencies
entries: When you choose this archetype at 3rd level, you gain proficiency with the {@item disguise kit|phb} and the {@item poisoner's kit|phb}.

subclassFeature.name: Infiltration Expertise
entries: 从9级开始，你可以不折不扣地为自己创造假身份。你必须花七天时间和25金币来建立一个身份的历史、职业和附属关系。你不能建立一个属于别人的身份。例如，你可以获得适当的衣服、介绍信和看起来像官方的证明，以建立自己是一个来自偏远城市的贸易公司的成员，这样你就可以潜入其他富商的公司。
此后，如果你采用新的身份作为伪装，其他生物就会相信你是那个人，直到有明显的理由不相信。

subclassFeature.name: Impostor
entries: 在13级时，你获得了准确无误地模仿另一个人的语言、书写和行为的能力。你必须花至少三个小时来研究这个人的这三个部分的行为，倾听讲话，检查笔迹，观察举止。
Your ruse is indiscernible to the casual observer. If a wary creature suspects something is amiss, you have advantage on any Charisma ({@skill Deception}) check you make to avoid detection.

subclassFeature.name: Death Strike
entries: Starting at 17th level, you become a master of instant death. When you attack and hit a creature that is {@quickref Surprise|PHB|3|0|surprised}, it must make a Constitution saving throw (DC 8 + your Dexterity modifier + your proficiency bonus). On a failed save, double the damage of your attack against the creature.

subclassFeature.name: Thief
entries: 你在偷窃的艺术中磨练自己的技能。盗贼、强盗、小偷和其他罪犯通常遵循这一原型，但那些喜欢把自己当作专业寻宝者、探险者、探索者和调查者的流氓也是如此。除了提高你的敏捷性和隐蔽性之外，你还可以学习到一些有用的技能，如钻研古代遗迹、阅读陌生的语言以及使用你通常无法使用的魔法物品。

subclassFeature.name: Fast Hands
entries: Starting at 3rd level, you can use the bonus action granted by your Cunning Action to make a Dexterity ({@skill Sleight of Hand}) check, use your {@item thieves' tools|phb} to disarm a trap or open a lock, or take the {@action Use an Object} action.

subclassFeature.name: Second-Story Work
entries: 当你在3级选择这个原型时，你获得了比正常情况下更快的攀爬能力；攀爬不再花费你的额外移动。
此外，当你进行奔跑跳跃时，你所覆盖的距离会增加等于你的灵巧修正值的英尺数。

subclassFeature.name: Supreme Sneak
entries: Starting at 9th level, you have advantage on a Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) check if you move no more than half your speed on the same turn.

subclassFeature.name: Use Magic Device
entries: 到了13级，你已经对魔法的运作有了足够的了解，即使物品不是为你准备的，你也能随机应变地使用它们。你无视所有等级、种族和级别对使用魔法物品的要求。

subclassFeature.name: Thief's Reflexes
entries: When you reach 17th level, you have become adept at laying ambushes and quickly escaping danger. You can take two turns during the first round of any combat. You take your first turn at your normal initiative and your second turn at your initiative minus 10. You can't use this feature when you are {@quickref Surprise|PHB|3|0|surprised}.

subclassFeature.name: Phantom
entries: 许多流氓在生与死之间行走，冒着自己的生命危险，夺取他人的生命。在这条线上冒险时，一些流氓发现与死亡本身有一种神秘的联系。这些流氓从死者身上获取知识，并沉浸在负能量中，最终变得像幽灵一样。盗贼行会重视他们，把他们作为高效的信息收集者和间谍。

Many shadar-kai of the Shadowfell are masters of these macabre techniques, and some are willing to teach this path. In places like Thay in the Forgotten Realms and Karrnath in Eberron, where many necromancers practice their craft, a Phantom can become a wizard's confidant and right hand. In temples of gods of death, the Phantom might work as an agent to track down those who try to cheat death and to recover knowledge that might otherwise be lost to the grave.
你是如何发现这种严峻的力量的？你是在墓地里睡觉，然后被你的新能力唤醒？还是你在献给死亡之神的寺庙或盗贼行会中培养了它们？

subclassFeature.name: Wails from the Grave
entries: {@i 3rd-level Phantom feature}
当你把某人推近坟墓时，你可以引导死亡的力量来伤害其他人。在你对一个生物造成偷袭伤害后，你可以立即以第一个生物30英尺内你能看到的第二个生物为目标。掷出你等级的一半偷袭骰子（四舍五入），第二个生物会受到与掷出的骰子总数相等的坏死伤害，同时他们周围会响起死亡的哀嚎。
你可以使用这个功能的次数与你的熟练度加成相等，当你完成一个长时间的休息时，你会恢复所有消耗的使用。

subclassFeature.name: Whispers of the Dead
entries: {@i 3rd-level Phantom feature}
那些已经死去的人的回声依附着你。每当你完成一个短期或长期的休息，你可以选择一个你缺乏的技能或工具的熟练度并获得它，因为一个幽灵般的存在与你分享它的知识。当你使用这个功能选择一个你所缺乏的不同的能力时，你会失去这个能力。

subclassFeature.name: Tokens of the Departed
entries: {@i 9th-level Phantom feature}

When a life ends in your presence, you're able to snatch a token from the departing soul, a sliver of its life essence that takes physical form: as a reaction when a creature you can see dies within 30 feet of you, you can open your free hand and cause a Tiny trinket to appear there, a soul trinket. The DM determines the trinket's form or has you roll on the {@item Trinket|phb|Trinkets} table in the {@i Player's Handbook} to generate it. You can have a maximum number of soul trinkets equal to your proficiency bonus, and you can't create one while at your maximum.
你可以通过以下方式使用灵魂饰品。

items: 当灵魂饰品在你身上的时候，你在死神救赎和宪法救赎上有优势，因为你的生命力被物品中的生命精华所增强。
当你在你的回合中造成偷袭伤害时，你可以摧毁你身上的一个灵魂饰品，然后立即使用 "墓穴哀嚎"，而不需要消耗该功能的使用权。

As an action, you can destroy one of your soul trinkets, no matter where it's located. When you do so, you can ask the spirit associated with the trinket one question. The spirit appears to you and answers in a language it knew in life. It's under no obligation to be truthful, and it answers as concisely as possible, eager to be free. The spirit knows only what it knew in life, as determined by the DM.

subclassFeature.name: Ghost Walk
entries: {@i 13th-level Phantom feature}

You can phase partially into the realm of the dead, becoming like a ghost. As a bonus action, you assume a spectral form. While in this form, you have a flying speed of 10 feet, you can hover, and attack rolls have disadvantage against you. You can also move through creatures and objects as if they were {@quickref difficult terrain||3}, but you take {@damage 1d10} force damage if you end your turn inside a creature or an object.
你在这种形态下停留10分钟，或者直到你以奖励行动的方式结束它。要再次使用这个功能，你必须完成一个长时间的休息，或者在你用来激活幽灵行走的奖励动作中，销毁你的一个灵魂饰品。

subclassFeature.name: Death's Friend
entries: {@i 17th-level Phantom feature}
你与死亡的关联已经变得如此密切，以至于你获得了以下好处。

items: 当你使用 "墓穴哀号 "时，你可以对第一个和第二个生物造成坏死伤害。
在长时间的休息结束后，如果你没有任何灵魂饰品，一个灵魂饰品会出现在你的手中，因为死者的灵魂被吸引到你身边。

subclassFeature.name: Soulknife
entries: Most assassins strike with physical weapons, and many burglars and spies use {@item thieves' tools|PHB} to infiltrate secure locations. In contrast, a Soulknife strikes and infiltrates with the mind, cutting through barriers both physical and psychic. These rogues discover psionic power within themselves and channel it to do their roguish work. They find easy employment as members of thieves' guilds, though they are often mistrusted by rogues who are leery of anyone using strange mind powers to conduct their business. Most governments would also be happy to employ a Soulknife as a spy.
在物质世界和精灵世界的古老森林的树木中，一些木精灵走在魂刀的道路上，充当他们森林的无声、致命的守护者。在吉斯人之间无休止的战争中，当需要隐身来对付吉斯人的敌人时，吉斯人被鼓励成为灵魂之刀。
作为一个魂刀，你的幻象能力可能从你还是个孩子的时候就一直困扰着你，只有在你经历了冒险的压力后才会充分显示出它们的潜力。或者你可能已经找到了一个隐居的通灵术士组织，并花了多年时间学习如何体现你的力量。

subclassFeature.name: Psionic Power
entries: {@i 3rd-level Soulknife feature}

You harbor a wellspring of psionic energy within yourself. This energy is represented by your Psionic Energy dice, which are each a {@dice d6}. You have a number of these dice equal to twice your proficiency bonus, and they fuel various psionic powers you have, which are detailed below.
你的一些能力会消耗他们所使用的幻能骰子，这在能力的描述中有所说明，如果一个能力要求你在你的骰子都被消耗掉时使用骰子，你就不能使用这个能力。当你完成一个长时间的休息时，你会重新获得你所有消耗的幻能骰子。此外，作为一个额外的动作，你可以重新获得一个已消耗的幻能骰子，但在你完成短时或长时休息之前，你不能再次这样做。
When you reach certain levels in this class, the size of your Psionic Energy dice increases: at 5th level ({@dice d8}), 11th level ({@dice d10}), and 17th level ({@dice d12}).
下面的力量使用你的幻觉能量骰子。

subclassFeature.name: Psychic Blades
entries: {@i 3rd-level Soulknife feature}

You can manifest your psionic power as shimmering blades of psychic energy. Whenever you take the {@action Attack} action, you can manifest a psychic blade from your free hand and make the attack with that blade. This magic blade is a simple melee weapon with the finesse and thrown properties. It has a normal range of 60 feet and no long range, and on a hit, it deals psychic damage equal to {@dice 1d6} plus the ability modifier you used for the attack roll. The blade vanishes immediately after it hits or misses its target, and it leaves no mark on its target if it deals damage.

After you attack with the blade, you can make a melee or ranged weapon attack with a second psychic blade as a bonus action on the same turn, provided your other hand is free to create it. The damage die of this bonus attack is {@dice 1d4}, instead of {@dice 1d6}.

subclassFeature.name: Soul Blades
entries: {@i 9th-level Soulknife feature}
Your Psychic Blades are now an expression of your psi-suffused soul, giving you these powers that use your Psionic Energy dice:

subclassFeature.name: Psychic Veil
entries: {@i 13th-level Soulknife feature}

You can weave a veil of psychic static to mask yourself. As an action, you can magically become {@condition invisible}, along with anything you are wearing or carrying, for 1 hour or until you dismiss this effect (no action required). This invisibility ends early immediately after you deal damage to a creature or you force a creature to make a saving throw.
一旦你使用这个功能，你就不能再这样做，直到你完成一个长时间的休息，除非你消耗一个幻象能量模子来再次使用这个功能。

subclassFeature.name: Rend Mind
entries: {@i 17th-level Soulknife feature}

You can sweep your Psychic Blades directly through a creature's mind. When you use your Psychic Blades to deal Sneak Attack damage to a creature, you can force that target to make a Wisdom saving throw (DC equal to 8 + your proficiency bonus + your Dexterity modifier). If the save fails, the target is {@condition stunned} for 1 minute. The {@condition stunned} target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.
一旦你使用这个功能，你就不能再这样做了，直到你完成一个长时间的休息，除非你消耗三个幻象能量骰子来再次使用它。

These rogues discover psionic power within themselves and channel it to do their roguish work. They find easy employment as members of thieves' guilds, though they are often mistrusted by rogues who are leery of anyone using strange mind powers to conduct their business, and most governments would be happy to employ a Soulknife as a spy.

subclassFeature.name: Psionic Talent
entries: {@i 3rd-level Soulknife feature}

You harbor a wellspring of psionic power within yourself, an energy that ebbs and flows as you channel it in various ways. This power is represented by your Psionic Talent die, the starting size of which is a {@dice d6}.

entries.name: Psionic Talent Options
entries: 你可以通过以下方式使用你的幻术天赋模子。

items.name: Psi-Bolstered Knack
items.entry: When your non-psionic training fails you, you can tap into your psionic power to help: if you fail an ability check using a skill or tool with which you have proficiency, you can roll your Psionic Talent die and add the number rolled to the check, potentially turning failure into success.

items.name: Psychic Whispers
items.entry: 你可以使用你的精神能力在你和他人之间建立心灵感应--非常适合于安静的渗透。作为一个行动，你可以给自己和至少一个其他生物以心灵感应的能力，与对方交谈。当你这样做时，掷出你的幻术天赋模子，选择你能看到的生物，最多相等于掷出的数量。在1小时内，被选择的生物可以与你进行心灵感应，你也可以与它们进行心灵感应。要发送或接收信息（不需要行动），你和另一个生物必须在彼此的1英里范围内。如果一个生物不能说任何语言，就不能使用这种心灵感应，而且一个生物可以在任何时候结束心灵感应的连接（不需要行动）。你和该生物不需要说一种共同的语言就能理解对方。

entries.name: Changing the Die's Size
entries: If you roll the highest number on your Psionic Talent die, it decreases by one die size after the roll. This represents you burning through your psionic energy. For example, if the die is a {@dice d6} and you roll a 6, it becomes a {@dice d4}. If it's a {@dice d4} and you roll a 4, it becomes unusable until you finish a long rest.

Conversely, if you roll a 1 on your Psionic Talent die, it increases by one die size after the roll, up to its starting size. This represents you conserving psionic energy for later use. For example, if you roll a 1 on a {@dice d4}, the die then becomes a {@dice d6}.

Whenever you finish a long rest, your Psionic Talent die resets to its starting size. When you reach certain levels in this class, the starting size of your Psionic Talent die increases: at 5th level ({@dice d8}), 11th level ({@dice d10}), and 17th level ({@dice d12}).

entries.name: Psi Replenishment
entries: 作为一个额外的动作，你可以让你的心灵平静片刻，并将你的幻术天赋模子恢复到起始大小。然后你不能再使用灵力补充术，直到你完成一个长时间的休息。

entries: {@i 3rd-level Soulknife feature}

When you are about to make a melee or ranged weapon attack against a creature, you can manifest a psychic blade from your free hand and make the attack with that blade. This magic blade is a simple melee weapon with the finesse and thrown properties. subclassFeature.name: Soul Blades
entries: {@i 9th-level Soulknife feature}
你的通灵之刃现在是你通灵的灵魂的表现，使你在以下方面对它们有更精细的控制。

items.name: Homing Strikes
items.entry: 如果你用你的通灵之刃做了一个攻击卷，但没有击中目标，你可以滚动你的幻术天赋模子，并将滚动的数字加到攻击卷上。如果这导致了攻击的命中，你的幻术天赋模子就会减少一个模子大小，而不考虑掷出的数字。

items.name: Psychic Teleportation
items.entry: 如果你的幻象天赋模子可用，你可以掷出你的通灵之刃，用魔法将自己传送到另一个地方。作为一个额外的动作，你显现出你的一把通灵之刃，并将它扔向一个你能看到的无人的空间，最远的距离等于你的幻象天赋模子上最高数字的5倍。然后你传送到那个空间，刀片消失，你的幻象天赋模子减少一个模子大小。

entries: {@i 13th-level Soulknife feature}

As an action, you can magically become {@condition invisible}, along with anything you are wearing or carrying, for 10 minutes or until you dismiss this effect (no action required). This invisibility ends if you deal damage to a creature or if you force a creature to make a saving throw.

Unless the save succeeds, the target is {@condition stunned} until the end of your next turn.

subclassFeature.name: Whispers of the Dead
entries: {@i 3rd-level Phantom feature}
那些死去的人的回声开始依附于你。每当你完成一次短期或长期的休息，你可以获得一个你选择的技能或工具的熟练度，因为一个幽灵般的存在与你分享它的知识。这个熟练度会持续到你再次使用这个功能。

subclassFeature.name: Tokens of the Departed
entries: {@i 9th-level Phantom feature}

When a life ends in your presence, you're able to snatch a token from the departing soul, a sliver of its life essence that takes physical form: as a reaction when a creature you can see dies within 30 feet of you, you open your free hand and a Tiny trinket appears there, a soul trinket. The DM chooses the trinket's form or has you roll on the {@item Trinket|PHB|Trinkets} table in the {@i Player's Handbook} to determine it.
当灵魂饰品在你身上的时候，你在死神救赎和宪法救赎上有优势，因为你的生命力被物品中的生命精华所增强。你可以拥有的灵魂饰品的最大数量等于你的熟练度加成，而且在你的最大数量时，你不能创造一个。
作为一个行动，你可以摧毁你的一个灵魂饰品，不管它在哪里。当你这样做时，你可以向与该饰品相关的灵魂问一个问题。灵魂会出现在你面前，用它生前熟悉的语言回答。它没有义务说实话，它尽可能简洁地回答，渴望自由。

subclassFeature.name: Ghost Walk
entries: {@i 13th-level Phantom feature}

You can now phase partially into the realm of the dead, becoming like a ghost. As a bonus action, you assume a spectral form. While in this form, you have a flying speed of 10 feet, you can hover, and attack rolls have disadvantage against you. You can also move through creatures and objects as if they were {@quickref difficult terrain||3}, but you take {@damage 1d10} force damage if you end your turn inside a creature or an object.
你在这种形态下停留10分钟，或者直到你以奖励行动的方式结束它。要再次使用这个功能，你必须完成一个长时间的休息，或者在你用来激活幽灵行走的奖励动作中，销毁你的一个灵魂饰品。

subclassFeature.name: Death Knell
entries: {@i 17th-level Phantom feature}
当你使用你的 "墓穴哀鸣 "功能时，你现在可以对第一个和第二个生物造成精神伤害。

subclassFeature.name: The Revived
entries: You've had a soul-shaking realization: you've been dead before, yet somehow you are alive again. This life isn't your first; it might not even be your second. Your past life, or lives, are unclear to you, but you know that you passed through the gates of death. And the powers of death, or some other influence, wasn't done with you. You might have convinced a deity to let you return to the Material Plane, perhaps you signed a deal with a fiend, or maybe you used an artifact that revived you. Whatever force brought you back, you now know the truth about yourself: that you are one of death's representatives among the living.

subclassFeature.name: Bolts from the Grave
entries: {@i 3rd-level Revived feature}
你已经学会了从你复活的身体中释放坏死的能量束。在你使用你的狡猾行动后，你可以立即对你周围30英尺内的生物进行一次远程法术攻击，前提是你本回合没有使用过偷袭。你精通此法，你在其攻击和伤害卷中加入你的灵巧修正值。被此攻击击中的生物会受到相当于你的偷袭的坏死伤害。这将使用你本回合的潜行攻击。

subclassFeature.name: Revived Nature
entries: {@i 3rd-level Revived feature}
你对死亡的新发现的联系给你带来以下好处。

items: You have advantage on saving throws against disease and being {@condition poisoned}, and you have resistance to poison damage.
你不需要吃，不需要喝，不需要呼吸。
你不需要睡觉。当你长时间休息时，你必须至少花四个小时处于不活动、不动的状态，而不是睡觉。在这种状态下，你仍然是半清醒的，你可以像正常人一样听到。

subclassFeature.name: Tokens of Past Lives
entries: {@i 3rd-level Revived feature}
你记得你在前世的天赋。当你完成一个长时间的休息，你会获得一个你选择的技能或工具的熟练度。当你完成一次长休时，你可以用另一个熟练度来代替这个熟练度。

subclassFeature.name: Connect with the Dead
entries: {@i 9th-level Revived feature}

You can create a link with a spirit through their corpse. When you do so, you cast the {@spell speak with dead} spell, without using a spell slot or material components. Intelligence is your spellcasting ability for this spell.
以这种方式与死者交谈会暂时给你一种来自过去生活的能力--你不确定那是来自你的过去还是灵魂的。当咒语结束时，你从复活能力表中获得一个随机的好处。这个好处一直持续到你完成一个短期或长期的休息。

entries.caption: Revived Capabilities
rows: 你学习如何说、读、写你选择的一种语言。
你获得一个你选择的技能或工具的熟练度。
你获得对你所选择的一种救赎方式的熟练掌握。

entries: 在你用这个特征施展法术后，你不能再这样做，直到你完成一个短期或长期的休息。

subclassFeature.name: Audience with Death
entries: {@i 13th-level Revived feature}
当在死亡之门前，你可以与死亡的力量交谈。你在死亡救赎上有优势，每当你做了一个死亡救赎，你的灵魂可以向一个死亡实体提出一个问题，可以用 "是"、"不是 "或 "未知 "来回答。该实体会用所有已死之人的知识如实回答。
In addition, whenever you have 0 hit points and are healed or stabilized, you can change any of your personal characteristics: personality trait, ideal, bond, or flaw.

subclassFeature.name: Ethereal Jaunt
entries: {@i 17th-level Revived feature}
像鬼魂一样，你有能力溜进和溜出虚空界。你现在可以使用你的狡猾行动来传送到你周围30英尺内无人的空间。你不需要看到那个空间就可以传送到那里，但是如果你试图通过中等或更大的魔法力量传送，例如力墙，你的传送就会失败，浪费你的奖励行动。如果你出现在一个被其他生物占据或被物体填满的空间里，你会立即被分流到你能占据的最近的未被占据的空间，并受到相当于你被分流距离两倍的力量伤害。

subclassFeature.name: Soulknife
entries: 灵魂之刀拥有强大的幻觉潜能。他们将这种内在的魔力储备转化为有形的精神能量之刃，打击受害者的心灵。他们很容易成为盗贼行会的成员，尤其是作为刺客受到追捧，因为他们标志性的精神之刃不会留下明显的伤痕。
作为一个灵魂之刀，你的幻象能力可能从你还是个孩子时就一直困扰着你，只有在你的灵能刀第一次出现时才显示出其潜力。或者你可能已经找到了一个隐居的幻象刺客组织，并花了数年时间学习如何展现你的致命之刃。

subclassFeature.name: Psionic Enhancement
entries: {@i 3rd-level Soulknife feature}
你可以集中你的幻象力来赋予自己一种非凡的能力。当你完成长期休息时，你会获得你所选择的以下一种好处，这种好处持续到你完成长期休息为止。

items: 你可以与你周围30英尺内你能看到的任何生物进行心灵感应。如果一个生物能说至少一种语言，它可以用心灵感应来回应你。
将你的行走速度提高5英尺。
你的最大命中率和你当前的命中率增加的数量等于你的智力修正值加上你的流氓等级。

subclassFeature.name: Psychic Blade
entries: {@i 3rd-level Soulknife feature}

As a bonus action, you can create a magical blade of shimmering psychic power from one or both of your hands. While one of your hands is manifesting a blade, you can't hold anything in that hand. You can dismiss one or both blades at any time (no action required), and they disappear if you're {@condition incapacitated}.

The blade is a simple melee weapon with the finesse, light, and thrown properties. It has a normal range of 30 feet and a long range of 60 feet, and it deals {@damage 1d6} psychic damage on a hit. If you throw the blade as part of an attack, it vanishes immediately after it hits or misses its target. The blade otherwise disappears the instant it leaves your hand.

subclassFeature.name: Terrifying Blade
entries: {@i 9th-level Soulknife feature}

Your psychic blades can now stoke terror within a target: When you damage a creature with your Psychic Blade, you can force the target to make a Wisdom saving throw (DC equal to 8 + your proficiency bonus + your Intelligence modifier). On a failed save, the creature is {@condition frightened} of you until the start of your next turn. On a successful save, the creature isn't {@condition frightened} and is immune to your Terrifying Blade for 24 hours.

subclassFeature.name: Psychic Veil
entries: {@i 13th-level Soulknife feature}

You can weave a veil of psionic static to mask your physical presence. As an action, you can magically become {@condition invisible}, along with anything you are wearing or carrying, for 10 minutes. This invisibility ends if you make an attack or if you force a creature to make a saving throw.
你可以使用这个功能的次数等于你的智力修饰值（最少一次），当你完成一个长时间的休息时，你会恢复所有消耗的使用。

subclassFeature.name: Rend Mind
entries: {@i 17th-level Soulknife feature}

You can sweep your Psychic Blade directly through a creature's mind. As an action while you have at least one Psychic Blade manifested, you can force a creature you can see within 30 feet of you to make an Intelligence saving throw (DC equal to 10 + your proficiency bonus + your Intelligence modifier). If you are hidden from the target, it has disadvantage on the save. On a failed save, the target takes {@damage 12d6} psychic damage, and it is {@condition stunned} until the start of your next turn. On a successful save, the target takes half as much damage and isn't {@condition stunned}. One of your Psychic Blades vanishes after using this feature.
你可以使用这个功能的次数等于你的智力修饰值（最少一次），当你完成一个长时间的休息时，你会恢复所有消耗的使用。

subclassFeature.name: Inquisitive
entries: 作为一个典型的探究者，你擅长于挖掘秘密和揭开谜团。你依靠你对细节的敏锐洞察力，同时也依靠你对其他生物的言行的精雕细琢来确定他们的真实意图。你擅长打败那些隐藏在普通人中间并捕食他们的生物，你对传说的掌握和你敏锐的眼光使你有能力揭发和结束隐藏的邪恶行为。

subclassFeature.name: Ear for Deceit
entries: When you choose this archetype at 3rd level, you develop a keen ear for picking out lies. Whenever you make a Wisdom ({@skill Insight}) check to sense if a creature is lying, you use the total of your check or 8 + your Wisdom modifier, whichever is higher. If you are proficient in {@skill Insight}, you add your proficiency bonus to the fixed result. If you chose {@skill Insight} as a skill augmented by your Expertise feature, add double your proficiency bonus.

subclassFeature.name: Eye for Detail
entries: Starting at 3rd level, you can use the bonus action granted by your Cunning Action feature to make a Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) check to spot a hidden creature or object, to make an Intelligence ({@skill Investigation}) check to uncover and decipher clues, or to use Insightful Fighting.

subclassFeature.name: Insightful Fighting
entries: At 3rd level, you gain the ability to decipher an opponent's tactics and develop a counter to them. As an action (or as a bonus action using Eye for Detail), you make a Wisdom ({@skill Insight}) check against a creature you can see that isn't {@condition incapacitated}, opposed by the target's Charisma ({@skill Deception}) check. If you succeed, you can use Sneak Attack against that creature even if you do not have advantage against it or if no enemy of the target is within 5 feet of it. You can use Sneak Attack in this way even if you have disadvantage against the target.
这个好处持续1分钟，或者直到你对不同的目标成功使用洞察力战斗。

subclassFeature.name: Steady Eye
entries: At 9th level, you gain advantage on any Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) check made on your turn to find a hidden creature or object if you do not move during that turn. If you use this ability before moving, you cannot move or ready movement during your turn.

subclassFeature.name: Unerring Eye
entries: 在13级时，你获得探测魔法欺骗的能力。作为一项行动，你可以感觉到在你30英尺范围内存在的幻觉、非真实形态的变形生物，以及其他旨在欺骗感官的魔法。尽管你确定一个效果试图欺骗你，但你并没有获得对所隐藏的东西或其真实性质的特殊洞察力。

subclassFeature.name: Eye for Weakness
entries: At 17th level, you learn to exploit a creature's weaknesses by carefully studying its tactics and movement. While your Insightful Fighting feature applies to a creature, your Sneak Attack damage against that creature increases by {@dice 2d6}.

subclassFeature.name: Scout
entries: 你精通木匠和隐身术，使你在远征时能够领先于你的同伴。拥护这一原型的流氓在荒野、野蛮人和战士中如鱼得水，因为他们是世界各地的战队的耳目。与其他流氓相比，你擅长在荒野中生存。

subclassFeature.name: Skirmisher
entries: 从第三级开始，你在战斗中很难被锁定。当敌人在你的5英尺范围内结束其回合时，你可以作为一种反应移动到你的一半速度。这种移动不会激起机会攻击。

subclassFeature.name: Survivalist
entries: When you choose this archetype at 3rd level, you gain proficiency in the {@skill Nature} and {@skill Survival} skills. Your proficiency bonus is doubled for any ability check you make that uses either of those proficiencies.

subclassFeature.name: Superior Mobility
entries: 9级时，你的行走速度增加10英尺。如果你有攀爬或游泳的速度，这种增加也适用于该速度。

subclassFeature.name: Ambush Master
entries: Starting at 13th level, you excel at leading ambushes. If any of your foes are {@quickref Surprise|PHB|3|0|surprised}, you can use a bonus action on your turn in the first round of the combat to grant each ally who can see you a +5 bonus to initiative that lasts until the combat ends. If the initiative bonus would increase an ally's initiative above yours, the ally's initiative instead equals your initiative.
每个盟友也会得到一个10英尺的速度提升，持续到盟友的下一个回合结束。

subclassFeature.name: Sudden Strike
entries: Starting at 17th level, you can strike with deadly speed. If you take the {@action Attack} action on your turn, you can make one additional attack as a bonus action. This attack can benefit from your Sneak Attack even if you have already used it this turn, but only if the attack is the only one you make against the target this turn.

subclassFeature.name: Inquisitive
entries: 作为一个典型的探究者，你擅长于挖掘秘密和揭开谜团。你依靠你对细节的敏锐洞察力，同时也依靠你对其他生物的言行的精雕细琢来确定他们的真实意图。你擅长打败那些隐藏在普通人中间并捕食他们的生物，你对传说的掌握和敏锐的推理使你有能力揭露和结束隐藏的邪恶。

subclassFeature.name: Ear for Deceit
entries: When you choose this archetype at 3rd level, you develop a talent for picking out lies. Whenever you make a Wisdom ({@skill Insight}) check to determine whether a creature is lying, treat a roll of 7 or lower on the {@dice d20} as an 8.

subclassFeature.name: Eye for Detail
entries: Starting at 3rd level, you can use a bonus action to make a Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) check to spot a hidden creature or object or to make an Intelligence ({@skill Investigation}) check to uncover or decipher clues.

subclassFeature.name: Insightful Fighting
entries: At 3rd level, you gain the ability to decipher an opponent's tactics and develop a counter to them. As a bonus action, you can make a Wisdom ({@skill Insight}) check against a creature you can see that isn't {@condition incapacitated}, contested by the target's Charisma ({@skill Deception}) check. If you succeed, you can use your Sneak Attack against that target even if you don't have advantage on the attack roll, but not if you have disadvantage on it.
这个好处持续1分钟，或者直到你对不同的目标成功使用这个功能。

subclassFeature.name: Steady Eye
entries: Starting at 9th level, you have advantage on any Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) or Intelligence ({@skill Investigation}) check if you move no more than half your speed on the same turn.

subclassFeature.name: Unerring Eye
entries: Beginning at 13th level, your senses are almost impossible to foil. As an action, you sense the presence of illusions, shapechangers not in their original form, and other magic designed to deceive the senses within 30 feet of you, provided you aren't {@condition blinded} or {@condition deafened}. You sense that an effect is attempting to trick you, but you gain no insight into what is hidden or into its true nature.
你可以使用这个功能的次数等于你的智慧修改器（最少一次），当你完成一个长时间的休息时，你会重新获得所有消耗的功能。

subclassFeature.name: Eye for Weakness
entries: At 17th level, you learn to exploit a creature's weaknesses by carefully studying its tactics and movement. While your Insightful Fighting feature applies to a creature, your Sneak Attack damage against that creature increases by {@dice 3d6}.

subclassFeature.name: Mastermind
entries: 你的注意力集中在人身上，以及他们的影响力和秘密。许多间谍、朝臣和阴谋家都遵循这一原型，过着阴谋的生活。言语是你的武器，就像刀子或毒药一样，而秘密和恩惠是你最喜欢的一些财富。

subclassFeature.name: Master of Intrigue
entries: When you choose this archetype at 3rd level, you gain proficiency with the {@item disguise kit|phb}, the {@item forgery kit|phb}, and one {@item gaming set|PHB} of your choice. You also learn two languages of your choice.
此外，你可以准确无误地模仿你听到的一个生物的说话方式和口音，至少1分钟，使你能够把自己当作某个地方的母语者，只要你懂得这种语言。

subclassFeature.name: Master of Tactics
entries: Starting at 3rd level, you can use the {@action Help} action as a bonus action. Additionally, when you use the {@action Help} action to aid an ally in attacking a creature, the target of that attack can be within 30 feet of you, rather than within 5 feet of you, if the target can see or hear you.

subclassFeature.name: Insightful Manipulator
entries: Starting at 9th level, if you spend at least 1 minute observing or interacting with another creature outside combat, you can learn certain information about its capabilities compared to your own. The DM tells you if the creature is your equal, superior, or inferior in regard to two of the following characteristics of your choice:
At the DM's option, you might also realize you know a piece of the creature's history or one of its personality traits, if it has any.

subclassFeature.name: Misdirection
entries: 从13级开始，你有时可以使另一个生物遭受到原本针对你的攻击。当你被攻击时，在你5英尺范围内的生物正给予你掩护以抵御该攻击，你可以使用你的反应来让该攻击针对该生物而不是你。

subclassFeature.name: Soul of Deceit
entries: Starting at 17th level, your thoughts can't be read by telepathy or other means, unless you allow it. You can present false thoughts by succeeding on a Charisma ({@skill Deception}) check contested by the mind reader's Wisdom ({@skill Insight}) check.
此外，无论你说什么，会确定你是否说实话的魔法表明你是在说实话，如果你选择的话，而你不能被魔法强迫说实话。

subclassFeature.name: Scout
entries: 你擅长隐身，并能在远离城市街道的地方生存，使你在远征时能在你的同伴之前进行侦察。拥护这一原型的罗格在野外、野蛮人和游骑兵之间游刃有余，许多侦察兵在战争中充当耳目。伏击者、间谍、赏金猎人--这些只是童子军在世界范围内承担的几个角色。

subclassFeature.name: Skirmisher
entries: 从第三级开始，你在战斗中很难被锁定。当敌人在你的5英尺范围内结束其回合时，你可以作为一种反应移动到你的一半速度。这种移动不会激起机会攻击。

subclassFeature.name: Survivalist
entries: When you choose this archetype at 3rd level, you gain proficiency in the {@skill Nature} and {@skill Survival} skills if you don't already have it. Your proficiency bonus is doubled for any ability check you make that uses either of those proficiencies.

subclassFeature.name: Superior Mobility
entries: 9级时，你的行走速度增加10英尺。如果你有攀爬或游泳的速度，这种增加也适用于该速度。

subclassFeature.name: Ambush Master
entries: 从13级开始，你擅长领导伏击和在战斗中率先行动。
你在主动性卷轴上有优势。此外，在战斗的第一轮中，你击中的第一个生物对你和其他人来说变得更容易攻击；对该目标的攻击卷有优势，直到你下一回合开始。

subclassFeature.name: Sudden Strike
entries: Starting at 17th level, you can strike with deadly speed. If you take the {@action Attack} action on your turn, you can make one additional attack as a bonus action. This attack can benefit from your Sneak Attack even if you have already used it this turn, but you can't use your Sneak Attack against the same target more than once in a turn.

subclassFeature.name: Swashbuckler
entries: 你把训练重点放在刀剑的艺术上，对速度、优雅和魅力的依赖程度相当高。虽然有些战士是身披重甲的野蛮人，但你的战斗方式看起来几乎像一场表演。决斗者和海盗通常属于这种类型的原型。
剑客擅长单兵作战，可以用两种武器作战，同时安全地躲避对手。

subclassFeature.name: Fancy Footwork
entries: 当你在3级选择这个原型时，你学会了如何进行一次攻击，然后溜走而不被报复。在你的回合中，如果你对一个生物进行了近战攻击，该生物在你回合的剩余时间内不能对你进行机会攻击。

subclassFeature.name: Rakish Audacity
entries: 从第三级开始，你的自信会推动你进入战斗。你可以给自己的主动性卷轴带来相当于你的魅力修改器的奖励。

You also gain an additional way to use your Sneak Attack; you don't need advantage on your attack roll to use Sneak Attack against a creature if you are within 5 feet of it, no other creatures are within 5 feet of you, and you don't have disadvantage on the attack roll. All the other rules for Sneak Attack still apply to you.

subclassFeature.name: Panache
entries: At 9th level, your charm becomes extraordinarily beguiling. As an action, you can make a Charisma ({@skill Persuasion}) check contested by a creature's Wisdom ({@skill Insight}) check. The creature must be able to hear you, and the two of you must share a language.
如果你检查成功，并且该生物对你有敌意，它在对你以外的目标进行攻击卷时有劣势，并且不能对你以外的目标进行机会攻击。这个效果持续1分钟，直到你的一个同伴攻击目标或用法术影响它，或者直到你和目标相距60英尺以上。

If you succeed on the check and the creature isn't hostile to you, it is {@condition charmed} by you for 1 minute. While {@condition charmed}, it regards you as a friendly acquaintance. This effect ends immediately if you or your companions do anything harmful to it.

subclassFeature.name: Elegant Maneuver
entries: Starting at 13th level, you can use a bonus action on your turn to gain advantage on the next Dexterity ({@skill Acrobatics}) or Strength ({@skill Athletics}) check you make during the same turn.

subclassFeature.name: Master Duelist
entries: 从17级开始，你对刀剑的掌握让你在战斗中转败为胜。如果你的攻击卷没打中，你可以以优势再次卷起。一旦你这样做了，你就不能再使用这个功能，直到你完成一个短期或长期休息。

subclassFeature.name: Psi-Bolstered Knack
entries: When your nonpsionic training fails you, your psionic power can help: if you fail an ability check using a skill or tool with which you have proficiency, you can roll one Psionic Energy die and add the number rolled to the check, potentially turning failure into success. You expend the die only if the roll succeeds.

subclassFeature.name: Psychic Whispers
entries: 你可以在自己和他人之间建立心灵感应--非常适合悄悄潜入。作为一个行动，选择一个或多个你能看到的生物，最多相当于你的熟练度加成，然后掷出一个幻能模子。在与掷出的数字相等的时间内，被选择的生物可以与你进行心灵感应，你也可以与他们进行心灵感应。要发送或接收信息（不需要行动），你和另一个生物必须在彼此的1英里之内。如果一个生物不能说任何语言，就不能使用这种心灵感应，而且一个生物可以在任何时候结束心灵感应的连接（不需要行动）。你和该生物不需要说一种共同的语言就能理解对方。
你在每次长时间休息后第一次使用这个能力时，你不需要消耗幻象能量模子。其他时候，你使用这个能力时，都要消耗骰子。

subclassFeature.name: Homing Strikes
entries: 如果你用你的通灵之刃做了一个攻击卷，但没有击中目标，你可以滚动一个幻象能量模子，并将滚动的数字加到攻击卷上。如果这导致了攻击的命中，你就会消耗幻能模子。

subclassFeature.name: Psychic Teleportation
entries: 作为一个额外的行动，你显现出你的一把通灵之刃，消耗一个幻象能量模子并掷出它，然后将这把刃扔向一个你能看到的无人的空间，最远的距离等于掷出数的10倍。然后你传送到那个空间，刀片就消失了。
